iati-activity.title: Improved Public Services in Sisian and Alaverdi ADPs through Citizen Empowerment
iati-activity.description: The project is designed to tackle the root causes of the lack of, or insufficient access to, good quality public services across 20 communities within 2 of the WV Armenia Area Development Programmes. The project aims to; a) further promote community participation and the delivery of basic services; b) further strengthen the capacity of local authorities to accept and promote civil society participation in decision making, implementing and monitoring processes; c) further build the capacity of the community and civil society to participate in these processes.
